Title: Episode 6
Plot: Adam and Zaf try to find a group of terrorists who have infiltrated Britain. Ros oversees a visit by a delegation of Saudi princes offering a guaranteed oil supply in exchange for nuclear expertise, but the Saudi Trade Centre is attacked by terrorists.
GuestStars: Davood Ghadami,  Simon Kassianides,  Alex Caan,  Raad Rawi,  Ian Bartholomew,  Dhafer L'Abidine,  Saskia Reeves,  Matt Day,  James Dicker,  Gugu  Mbatha-Raw,  Ashwin Bolar,  Amar Hussain
